name: Stop The Grinch
description:
Press the fullscreen option to play in right format

W,  S  to move up and down

collect the presents to save christmas! Reach 1250m To win!

DONT UPGRADE PRESENT SPAWN RATE MORE THEN 3 TIMES 

Thank you for playing :)

Music by 8-Bit universe

Made by WilgotW and AlexTheOne
